directions: Blend tomato paste, apple cider vinegar, maple syrup, molasses, mustard powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, sea salt, ground black pepper, and sugar together in a blender.
Pour blended mixture into a saucepan and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until just heated through, about 5 minutes.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons natural turbinado sugar (such as Sugar InThe Raw®)
title: Vegan Barbeque Sauce
